import React, { useState } from 'react'; export default function Register() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ username: "", email: "", password: "" }); const handleChange = (e) => { const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }) } return (
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
) }
